page.title: 08SHOPPING AND COMMERCE
page.content: While Newhey has some low-order shops{Milnrow}is the main shopping centre in this D-block. In Milnrow there are two supermarkets,several food shops and others selling clothes, electrical goods,hardware,antiques videos and do-it-yourself goods.The services provided include ladies and gents hairdressing shops,a betting office,an optician,2 banks a post office,building society offices,a solicitor and estate agents In a{survey of shoppers}it was found that many people living in the area used the local shops for small purchases and did their main shopping in Rochdale town centre or large supermarkets. Old people and those without their own transport shopped in the village Examples of{food } {prices}include;small uncut loaf 32p 250gm butter 45p,1kg sugar 44p.
